content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Duisburg to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your time and effort. After seeing the apartment, I believe it has great potential. Regarding the rental price, I'm looking to pay a fair amount that reflects the value of the property. Could you please share your initial price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, Maryam. I'm confident in the value of my apartment. For a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, with proximity to all essential amenities, I would expect a rental price of €1,000 per month. Is this within your budget range?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your apartment sounds very attractive, Mr. Schmidt. However, I'm seeking a price that aligns with my budget. Could we negotiate a lower rate?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, Maryam. I'm open to negotiations. How much lower were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I was thinking of a rate around €800 per month. This would be more in line with my budget. Is there any possibility we could meet at this price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: €800 per month is significantly lower than my initial offer. While I'm open to negotiation, I must maintain a fair price for my property. How about we meet in the middle at €900 per month? This would be a fair compromise, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your suggestion of €900 per month is more reasonable. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. I think this could be a good starting point for our agreement. Would you be willing to finalize the contract at this price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that you find €900 per month acceptable. If you agree to this price, we can proceed with the contract. I agree to the price of €900 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful! I'm pleased to have reached an agreement with you, Mr. Schmidt. €900 per month is a fair price for both parties. I look forward to signing the contract and moving into the apartment. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
